alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 5:11AM AKDT until March 30 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations 4 inches. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow is causing low visibility this morning. Winds will decrease over St Lawrence Island later this morning, and over the Bering Strait this evening. but snow will continue through Thursday. Winds will turn north and increase again on Thursday with more blowing snow on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
